TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable MalformedLineException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 当 方法不能使用指定格式分析行时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the method cannot parse a row using the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查以确保`TextFieldType`和`Delimiter`参数定义是正确的。Check to ensure that the `TextFieldType` and `Delimiter` parameters are defined properly. 如果方法无法分析使用指定的格式，行引发异常。If the method cannot parse a row using the specified format, the exception is thrown. 该异常包含格式不正确的行的行号。The exception contains the line number of the malformed line.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 继承自类。 inherits from the class. 此构造函数设置的属性对象下表中所示。This constructor sets the properties of the object as shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |-|-| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| ||`message`字符串。The `message` string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

span.span: The object that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 catch 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的相同值，如果传递到构造函数中，则为空引用属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |-|-| ||`innerException`引用。The `innerException` reference.| ||`message`字符串。The `message` string.|

The line number of the malformed line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法无法分析使用指定的格式，行引发异常。If the method cannot parse a row using the specified format, the exception is thrown. 该异常包含格式不正确的行的行号。The exception contains the line number of the malformed line.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 创建并返回当前异常的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of the current exception.

returns.span: 当前异常的字符串表示形式。

span.span: A string representation of the current exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回当前异常，但应为人所理解的表示形式。 returns a representation of the current exception that is intended to be understood by humans. 当该异常包含区分区域性的数据，返回的字符串表示需要当前系统区域性考虑在内。Where the exception contains culture-sensitive data, the string representation returned by is required to take into account the current system culture. 虽然没有返回字符串的确切要求的格式，它应尝试反映为从用户的角度对象的值。Although there are no exact requirements for the format of the returned string, it should attempt to reflect the value of the object as perceived by the user. 默认实现获取引发当前异常，消息、 调用的结果的类名称内部异常，调用，和格式不正确的行的行号如果这些成员中的任何为空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，其值不包括在返回的字符串。The default implementation of obtains the name of the class that threw the current exception, the message, the result of calling on the inner exception, the result of calling , and the line number of the malformed line If any of these members is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), its value is not included in the returned string. 如果没有任何错误消息，或如果它是空字符串 ("")，则不返回任何错误消息。If there is no error message or if it is an empty string (""), then no error message is returned. 只有当它们不是 null 引用时，才会返回内部异常和堆栈跟踪的名称 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The name of the inner exception and the stack trace are returned only if they are not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 此方法重写 。This method overrides .
